title: Oppo F31 Pro and F31 Pro+ launch with enhanced durability, 7,000 mAh batteries
summary: Just as previously promised, today Oppo made the F31 Pro and F31 Pro+ official in India. The vanilla F31 was supposedly coming too, but it's not live on the brand's website just yet. Anyway, the F31 Pro comes in Space Grey and Desert Gold and has a 6.57-inch 1080x2372 AMOLED screen with 120Hz refreâ€¦
